title: Bitcoin ETFs Smash $50 Billion Inflows in 2025 – BlackRock Leads the Charge
shortdescription: Institutional money floods crypto as spot Bitcoin ETFs become the fastest-growing product ever.
description: BlackRock’s IBIT alone crosses $25B AUM – total Bitcoin ETF assets now exceed gold ETFs in record time.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Ethereum 'Pectra' Upgrade Goes Live – Staking Withdrawals Finally Here
shortdescription: Long-awaited upgrade unlocks $35B in staked ETH – price surges 12% overnight.
description: The biggest Ethereum upgrade since the Merge successfully activates, enabling validator exits and reducing sell pressure fears.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Solana Mobile 2 Sells Out in 24 Hours – 150,000 Units Gone Instantly
shortdescription: The $450 crypto phone becomes the hottest gadget of 2025 – resale prices hit $2,000.
description: Saga Chapter 2 with built-in seed vault and dApp store sells out despite bear market – proving crypto phones are back.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Coinbase Settles with SEC for $200M – Ends 3-Year Legal Battle
shortdescription: Major victory for crypto industry as regulator drops staking-as-security claims.
description: Agreement allows Coinbase to continue staking services – seen as massive regulatory win for entire sector.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Ripple vs SEC Case Officially Dismissed – XRP Surges 40% Overnight
shortdescription: After 4 years, judge rules XRP not a security in landmark victory.
description: SEC drops appeal after devastating court loss – XRP relisted on major U.S. exchanges within hours.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Binance Founder CZ Released from Prison – Announces New DeFi Project
shortdescription: Changpeng Zhao walks free after 4-month sentence – crypto community celebrates.
description: CZ hints at launching privacy-focused DeFi exchange with zero-KYC trading – BNB pumps 25% on announcement.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Trump Announces U.S. Strategic Bitcoin Reserve – BTC Hits $108,000
shortdescription: President-elect confirms government will hold Bitcoin as national reserve asset – biggest crypto policy win ever.
description: In first post-election speech, Donald Trump declares the United States will begin accumulating Bitcoin as a strategic reserve, similar to oil. Treasury to purchase 1 million BTC over 5 years.
author: Crypto Insider

title: Circle Files for $50 Billion IPO – USDC Becomes First Public Stablecoin Giant
shortdescription: USDC issuer goes public at highest crypto valuation since Coinbase – Tether market share plummets.
description: Circle's S-1 reveals $1.1B annual revenue, 85% institutional volume, and plans to dominate regulated stablecoin market after going public in 2025.
author: Crypto Insider
